name: Video Game Thieves From Outher Space
name_original: Video Game Thieves From Outher Space
description:
Some unrighteous alien dudes have stolen your awesome video game collection. Of course you know, this means war!

* Now with 100% less payment required! (Still, the PayPal button is right there...)

* 6 challenging levels (or could there be more?) to test your platforming prowess

* Secret collectibles around every corner. Can you find them all?

* Funky fresh retro soundtrack

* No social network integration whatsoever. Your online friends will never know about that cool thing you just did, just as nature intended!

Trailer
